alert.note: Alert for Chambers; Clay; Randolph; Tallapoosa (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 30 at 11:27AM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Randolph, northern Tallapoosa, northern Chambers and southeastern Clay Counties through NOON CST... At 1127 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over New Site, or 11 miles northeast of Alexander City, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Alexander City, Roanoke, Stroud, New Site, Wadley, Goldville, Post Oak Forks, Abanda, Standing Rock, Welch, Trammel Crossroads, Hillabee Creek, Fredonia, Veasey Creek Park, Crystal Lake, Penton, Sparkling Springs, Northern Lake Martin, Daviston and Dickert. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
